name: 蔡逸萍
objective:
【本課程為一學期主題課程，下學期將搭配其他主題課程】

本課程旨在訓練學生能夠靈活運用旅行中會使用的英文，並了解觀光產業的發展及所需之英文溝通內容和能力。課程中透過主題討論，讓學生對於本國及全球觀光產業及事務有進一步的認識。
This course aims to enable students to use English confidently and effectively as professionals in tourism industry. In this course, students will also learn about trends and development in the industry at the local and global level, and strengthen their English communicative competence.
